definition: overcast (weather)/cloudy/shady/Yin (the negative principle of Yin and Yang)/negative (electric.)/feminine/moon/implicit/hidden/genitalia

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: It can be irritating to your skin when your sweaty pubic hair rubs against hers.
sentences.chinese: 如果你汗溼的陰毛對着她磨蹭，可能刺激到你的皮膚。

sentences.english: Did you or did you not trim your pubic hair before we met?
sentences.chinese: 你有還是沒有在我們見面之前，修剪過你的陰毛？

sentences.english: Pubic lice infest only pubic hair.
How did pubes get such a bad rap?
sentences.chinese: 陰毛怎麼會有這樣的一個壞名聲？

sentences.english: Nancy slowly unzips her shorts down to just above her pubic hair.
sentences.chinese: 南希慢慢拉下她的短褲恰在她陰毛的上方。

sentences.english: As Muslims we are required to shave pubic hair.
sentences.chinese: 作爲穆斯林，我們被要求剃除陰毛。

sentences.english: Ahmad was asked about removing the pubic hair with scissors.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈邁德被問到使用剪刀去除陰毛的事。

definition: armpit/also pr. [ge1 zhi5 wo1]/also written 夾肢窩|夹肢窝[ga1 zhi5 wo1]
to claw wildly/to scratch frantically/to arrest people indiscriminately
to form a scar/to form a scab
